name: The Stoat (Inscryption)
description:
Inscryption by Daniel Mullins

The Stoat v1.9.1 by Clara Jones

I've now received permission from Daniel Mullins himself to use them for this project so long as it's freely available!

In this project you can type anything you want and it will appear as the stoat from the game had said it.

The at symbol is disabled because this font has it as something that does not look like the at sign.

Thank you Daniel Mullins for allowing me to make this public!

Devlog: https://ramen4608.itch.io/inscryption-stoat/devlog
